lead_paragraph: Remy Abell scored a career-high 21 points, and No. 6 Xavier recovered from its first loss of the season by beating No. 9 Butler 88-69 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Remy Abell Scores 21, No. 6 Xavier Beats No. 9 Butler 88-69
headline.main: Remy Abell Scores 21, No. 6 Xavier Beats No. 9 Butler 88-69

snippet: Remy Abell scored a career-high 21 points, and No. 6 Xavier recovered from its first loss of the season by beating No. 9 Butler 88-69 on Saturday....
